entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as calm and enjoying himself. He looks at Snape with a quiet tone, suggesting he has authority over the situation.

entities.name: fudge

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as beside himself, angry, and accusatory towards Harry Potter. His behavior suggests he is under a lot of stress or emotion.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is described as trying to calm Snape down and asserting that the students have not left their beds.

entities.name: harry potter

entities.name: hermione

relationships.description: Snape accuses Harry Potter of helping him escape, suggesting a direct relationship between the two entities.
Dumbledore tries to calm Snape down, indicating a relationship where Dumbledore has authority over Snape.
Fudge tries to reason with Snape, suggesting a relationship where Fudge is trying to calm or appease Snape.
